channel.title: 🏢 Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Texas A&M University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Texas A&M University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Federated Ensemble-Directed Offline Reinforcement Learning
item.description: FEDORA, a novel algorithm, enables high-quality policy learning in federated offline reinforcement learning by leveraging the collective wisdom of diverse client datasets without data sharing.
